TestKitchenEnableExperiments.description: If this is falsy, then all experiment-related behavior is disabled.

TestKitchenEnableExperimentConfigsFetchi.description: Enable fetching experiment configs from Test Kitchen during the request if no experiments are defined in $wgTestKitchenExperiments. WARNING: This will degrade performance for logged-in users.

TestKitchenExperimentEventIntakeServiceU.description: The URL of the EventGate instance to send events to that originate from everyone experiments.

TestKitchenLoggedInExperimentEventIntake.description: The URL of the EventGate instance to send events to that originate from logged-in experiments.

TestKitchenInstrumentEventIntakeServiceU.description: The URL of the EventGate instance to send events to that originate from instruments.

TestKitchenExperimentStreamNames.description: The names of the event streams for experiments configured in Test Kitchen.

TestKitchenAuthPreserveQueryParamsExperi.description: List of experiment names to use in the AuthPreseveQueryParams hook. For each experiment listed here, AuthPreserveQueryParams will add its assigned group to a query param in the form ?mpo=<experiment1-name:group>;<experiment2-name:group>
